title: ShopHer Media Expands Marketing Reach to Social Media Influencers and Mom Bloggers to Deliver Effective Advertising Campaigns for Large Brands
text:
ShopHer Media's traditional strength has been in performance based marketing, but have grown tremendously in the area of influencer marketing and blogger outreach over the past 12 months.
Fort Lauderdale, FL (PRWEB) September 30, 2015
ShopHer Media , a leading provider of performance based advertising campaigns to large consumer brands, has broadened their reach to encompass both social media influencers and women-based bloggers of all types. Established in 2007, ShopHer Media provides effective distribution of exclusive promotions and marketing initiatives which allow brands to reach their target markets via some of the largest social media influencers and “mommy bloggers.”
Jeremy Bleech, CTO of ShopHer Media stated, “The difference between ShopHer Media and other blogger outreach programs is not only the quality of the blogs we partner with, but that we provide performance analytics to our clients so they can better track their ROI.” It’s the combination of ShopHer Media’s network of quality web publishers and transparent campaign tracking that attracts brands like P&G, Target, and Chiquita to ShopHer Media to run their consumer-oriented promotions. Brands like these and others utilize ShopHer Media to drive consumer behavior to the offers and promotions they are distributing through the very pervasive social media influencer channel.
Some of the types of advertising campaigns ShopHer Media runs include:
Sponsored/Pay Per Post Performance Campaigns (CPA) Branding and Awareness (CPM) Social Buzz Email Marketing Lead Generation
About ShopHer Media: Entrepreneurs and co-founders, Brandt Held and Jeremy Bleech first met in kindergarten. Their shared interests, integrity and vision led to the founding of ShopHer Media. At the intersection of social media, mommy bloggers, brands and women shoppers their approach applies industry leading technology to digital and shopper marketing goals. Today, as the company continues to grow, their performance speaks for itself among the major brands and agencies that leverage ShopHer Media’s innovative marketing platform to see mind-blowing results.
If you are a brand looking to leverage social media influencers and mom bloggers of all types, visit Shop Her Media to learn more.
